com.github.brigade.ui.screen.component

Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.brigade.ui.screen.component.Component
      • com.github.brigade.ui.screen.component.Container

  • public class Container
extends Component
    Contains sub-components and passes information along to them.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Container(int x, int y, int width, int height, Component[] components)
      Creates a new container

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Component getComponent(int index)
      Returns the component at a specific index of the components in the array of components in the container
      Component[] getComponents()
      Returns all of the components in the container
      void onClick(int mouseID)
      If the container is clicked it sends the click to all of the components inside of it
      void render()
      Draws the container to the screen
      void update()
      Updates the state of the button
